List.Label: Operation
List.Description: The OPERATION command is used to turn the converter output on or off in conjunction with the input from the CTRL pin.

Option.Label: On - Margin State Low (Act on Fault)
On - Margin State High (Act on Fault)

SendButton.Label: Clear Faults
SendButton.Description: The CLEAR_FAULTS command is used to reset all stored warning and fault flags. See datasheet for additional details.

AutoList.Label: Time ON Delay
AutoList.Description: The TON_DELAY command sets the time (in ms), from when a start condition is received (as programmed by the ON_OFF_CONFIG command) until the output voltage starts to rise.

List.Label: Time ON Rise
List.Description: The TON_RISE command sets the soft-start time (in ms) from when the output starts to rise until the voltage has reached the regulation point.

List.Label: ON Bit
List.Description: This on bit sets the default to either operate whenever the input voltage is present or for the on/off to be controlled by CTRL and PMBusTM commands.

List.Label: OP Bit
List.Description: This op bit controls how the converter responds to the OPERATION commands.

List.Label: Control Bit
List.Description: This ctrl bit controls how the converter responds to the CTRL pin.

AutoList.Label: Min
AutoList.Description: sets an lower limit on the output voltage.

AutoList.Label: Max
AutoList.Description: Sets an upper limit on the output voltage.

AutoList.Label: OV Warn
AutoList.Description: The VIN_OV_WARN_LIMIT setting value should not be higher than 18V.

AutoList.Label: UV Warn
AutoList.Description: The VIN_UV_WARN_LIMIT setting value should be higher than 3.3V.

AutoList.Label: OV Fault
AutoList.Description: The VIN_OV_FAULT_LIMIT setting value should not be higher than 18V.

BitStatus.Label: OC_VOUT_UV
BitStatus.Description: Over Current and Under VOUT Fault

Bit.Name: Bit7
Bit.Description: Disable all writes except to the WRITE_PROTECT command.

Bit.Name: Bit6
Bit.Description: Disable all writes except to the WRITE_PROTECT, OPERATION and PAGE commands.

Bit.Name: Bit5
Bit.Description: Disable all writes except to the WRITE_PROTECT, OPERATION, PAGE, ON_OFF_ CONFIG and VOUT_COMMAND commands.
